entry.title: Galaxy Minstrels Big Bag - 66g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.29

Simply the Smoothest!

     For the most luxurious chocolate on a dime, Galaxy is a UK specialty you don't want to miss out on! Their Minstrels consist of silky smooth milk chocolate wrapped in a decadent candy shell﻿, like M&M's but so much better. A few bites in and you'll be wondering how you went your whole life without having tried them before!

     Take your tastebuds on an adventure to a different land and introduce them to the mesmerizing taste of smooth Galaxy chocolate; they deserve it. Just don't forget to share!

66g | 1 pouch

entry.title: Yorkie Orange Bar - 46g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.99

For the Insatiable Orange Chocolate Lover

     Sometimes you just want to chew on a massive chunk of creamy milk chocolate, that's what the Yorkie bar was created for! This classic favourite we imported fresh from the UK is infused with real orange oil, giving a citrusy twist to the traditional milk chocolate taste. 

     Don't miss out on this Limited Edition treat that'll give you a little taste of Britain. Perfect as a gift or an upgrade to your late-night snacks. 

46g | 1 bar

entry.title: Revels - 35g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.49

The Treat That's Never Boring!

     If you're looking for something to spice up your late-night munchies stash, we've got just the treat for you! 

     Revels is a smooth chocolatey treat we imported straight from the UK with a fun surprise. Each bite-sized morsel has a different center every time! It's always a guessing game when you pop another into your mouth. Will you taste orange? Coffee? Raisin? Maybe you get a plain chocolate dud here and there, but there's the potential for Malteser or even creamy toffee! 

     Sounds like something that could only be thought up by Willy Wonka or a game show host! If you're a fan of variety or mystery, this is the perfect snack for you. 

35g | 1 pouch

entry.title: Nestle Munchies Milk Chocolate Roll - 51.9g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle UK
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.99

A Delicious Sweet Brought Straight from the UK!

     If you're ever on the go and need a quick treat to brighten up your day, why not try Nestle Munchies! Buttery, crunchy cookie center wrapped in smooth caramel and then coated in a rich milk chocolate exterior, this is a chocolatey sweet with layers of deliciousness.

entry.title: Cadbury Dairy Milk Orange Giant Buttons UK - 95g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.99

Dairy Milk with a Citrusy Twist!

     Imported directly from the UK, here's a Dairy Milk treat you're bound to adore! Orange Giant Buttons have the same silky smooth Dairy Milk chocolate texture you've come to love, with the added touch of real orange oil. Let each button coat your tongue in the beautiful blend of chocolate and fruity citrus flavour, it's an irresistible combination.

entry.title: Kinder Chocolate with Cereal Bar UK - 24g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrero
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.29

Add a Bit of Crunch to Your Kinder Delight!

     Whether you're a fan of Kinder chocolate or you just want a deliciously creamy treat with a twist, Kinder Chocolate with Cereals is sure to pop its way into your heart!

     The silkiest smooth milk chocolate filled with a creamy milk center and then stuffed with 5 kinds of popped cereal grains (rice, buckwheat, barley, hulled wheat, and wheat), this is the kind of chocolatey delight that'll make your mouth water uncontrollably. No matter if this is your own personal treat or a gift for someone else to enjoy, it's a guaranteed smile every time!

24g | 1 bar

Imported Fresh From The UK!

entry.title: Cadbury Flake Bars UK - 4 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.59

British Chocolate Bars

The Cadbury Flake Bar is one of the most irresistible Chocolate Bars ever made! This British Chocolate bar consists of layers of fine ribbons of Milk Chocolate that are folded onto each other producing a delicate yet substantially delicious bar!

Since 1920, these have been the flakiest of them all! No other chocolate bar is as succulent or luscious as the Cadbury Flake Bar. This British Chocolate bar will flake onto the corners of your mouth with each bite making it all the more enjoyable!

entry.title: Fruit-tella Koala Candy - 120 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fruit-tella
Type: CAndy
Price: 2.99

Gelatine Free Koalas

Fruit lovers inspired Fruittella to create delicious sweets made with fruit juice, natural flavours and colourings!

Now you can enjoy Fruittella's unmistakably fruity taste with our GELATINE FREE Koalas.

Vegetarian Society approved for Vegans.

120 g

Ingredients:

Glucose syrup, sugar, modified starch, fruit juices from concentrate (raspberry, lemon, pineapple) (3%), acid (citric acid), natural flavourings, coconut oil, concentrates (safflower, carrot, radish, spirulina, lemon, blackcurrant), glazing agent (carnauba wax).

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: Nestle Munchies Cookie Dough UK - 101 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestlé
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.59

Imported British Candy

Nestle Munchies Cookie Dough is a British candy you’ve just got to try. Love the taste of cookie dough? Look no further. Nestle’s created this flavour just for you. Expert Nestle chocolatiers at the company’s Newcastle factory came up with this heavenly cookie dough flavour.

Delectable squares of chocolate and cookie dough goodness, Nestle Munchies Cookie Dough is the snack you’ll go for when you crave that classic comfort food taste. In each cube is soft cookie dough flavour and centre of crunchy biscuit.

Pick up a few bags of Nestle Munchies Cookie Dough so you have enough to share with your family and friends.

  • Creamy milk chocolate cubes encasing a soft cookie dough flavour and crunchy biscuit centre
  • No artificial colours flavours and preservatives
  • The ideal treat to share with family and friends
